  • Method Details

    • replaceExprsInStmt

      public static <T extends Type> Optional<XcfaLabel> replaceExprsInStmt(XcfaLabel stmt, Function<Expr<?>,Optional<Expr<T>>> mapper)
      Replace expressions in a stmt based on a given Expr to Opt(Expr) mapping function
      Parameters:
      stmt - Statement to replace expressions in
      mapper - Mapping function that returns a new Expression when necessary, empty otherwise
      Returns:
      Optional.empty() when no modification was necessary, the new XcfaLabel otherwise

    • replacesVarsInStmt

      public static <T extends Type> Optional<XcfaLabel> replacesVarsInStmt(XcfaLabel stmt, Function<VarDecl<?>,Optional<VarDecl<T>>> mapper)
      Replace expressions in a stmt based on a given Var to Opt(Var) mapping function
      Parameters:
      stmt - Statement to replace expressions in
      mapper - Mapping function that returns a new VarDecl when necessary, empty otherwise
      Returns:
      Optional.empty() when no modification was necessary, the new XcfaLabel otherwise

    • replaceVarWithArrayItem

      public static <P extends Type> List<XcfaLabel> replaceVarWithArrayItem(XcfaLabel stmt, Map<Decl<?>,Tuple2<VarDecl<ArrayType<P,?>>,LitExpr<P>>> lookup)
      Replace every instance of the declarations in `lookup` with an array read/write reference
      Parameters:
      stmt - The stmt to replace the decls in
      lookup - The lookup table to use for mapping variables to array items
      Returns:
      Returns the statement(s) - multiple in the case of a Havoc stmt
